name: L25 Farm Friends
description:
Join Eggy the chicken, Moo Moo the cow, and Ziggy the pig on a scavenger hunt around the farm. Find funny items to play with their farm friends. Children will enhance their ability to distinguish between singular and plural nouns. They will also be able to identify and add the correct ending when changing singular nouns to plural. 

Grade: Grade 1
Subject: Language (English)
Section: Grammar
Lesson: Regular Plural Nouns
